sentences.en: As soon as I came downstairs the burglar bolted out.
sentences.cn: 我一下楼,窃贼便狂奔而逃.

sentences.en: Did a burglar break into your house last night?
sentences.cn: 昨晚有个窃贼闯进你家 吗 ?

sentences.en: She playacted the movements of a burglar.
sentences.cn: 他把窃盗的举动戏剧化了.

sentences.en: The barking of the dog frightened the burglar away.
sentences.cn: 狗叫声把那个盗贼吓跑了.

sentences.en: The burglar alarm is activated by movement.
sentences.cn: 这防盗警报器一动就会响。

sentences.en: The burglar got in through the window.
The burglar made away with several valuable jewels worth about & 10,000.
sentences.cn: 窃贼偷走了价值约一万英镑的几件珍宝.

sentences.en: The burglar made his getaway across the roof.
The burglar outwitted the police and got [ ran ] away.
sentences.cn: 那名窃贼以机智 瞒 过警方而开溜.

sentences.en: The burglar shone his torch into the dark room.
sentences.cn: 盗贼将手电筒照进黑暗的房间.

sentences.en: The man glanced the burglar climbing out of the window.
sentences.cn: 那人瞥见小偷从窗户爬出来.

sentences.en: The new security guard is a burglar — that'll put the cat among the pigeons.
sentences.cn: 新来的守卫是小偷——这下子可要鸡犬不宁了.

sentences.en: The police were unable to penetrate the wiles of the cat burglar.
sentences.cn: 警方无法识破窃贼的诡计.

sentences.en: The policeman took the burglar by surprise as he opened the window.
sentences.cn: 当夜盗开窗时,警察冷不防地捉住了他.

sentences.en: This burglar thought old people are easy prey.
sentences.cn: 这个夜贼觉得老人容易下手。

phrases.tran_cn: 防窃报警器；防盗自动警铃

trans.tran_en: someone who goes into houses, shops etc to steal things
